name: Topic
doc: Represents a general conversation topic / theme, assigned to a single persona

combos.name: TopicWithSettings
combos.doc: Includes settings with a topic instance

props.doc: Time when this topic was archived

name: TopicSettings
doc: Specifies the name of a topic and the persona with whom that topic is discussed

props.doc: Id of the topic these settings describe
Id of the persona with whom this topic is discussed

props.name: name
props.doc: Name assigned to this topic
Time when these settings were replaced with another version

name: Thread
doc: Represents a single named sequence of conversations within a specific topic

props.doc: Id of the general topic of this thread

props.name: name
props.doc: The current name of this thread

props.name: archivedAfter
props.doc: Time when this thread was archived

name: Conversation
doc: Represents an individual conversation with a persona

combos.name: ConversationWithSessions
combos.doc: Links individual sessions to a conversation

props.doc: Id of the thread this conversation is part of

props.name: closedAfter
props.doc: Time when this conversation was closed the last time

combos.name: StatementLinkedConversationSummary
combos.doc: Includes links to individual statements made within this summary

props.doc: Id of the conversation this is a summary of
Time when this summary was replaced with a new version

name: ConversationSummaryStatementLink
doc: Links statements to conversation summaries in which they appear

props.name: summaryId
props.doc: Id of the linked conversation summary

props.name: role
props.doc: Role of the linked statement in the linked summary

name: Session
doc: Represents an individual user session within a conversation

combos.name: SummaryStatementLinkedSession
combos.doc: Includes links to statements which appear within this session's summary

props.doc: Id of the conversation active during this session

props.name: started
props.doc: Time when this session started

props.name: ended
props.doc: Time when this session ended. None while active.

name: SessionSummaryStatementLink
doc: Links statements to session summaries in which they appear

props.name: sessionId
props.doc: Id of the session being summarized

name: Message
doc: Represents a single message from the user or from a persona

combos.name: StatementLinkedMessage
combos.doc: Includes links to the statements made within this message

props.doc: Id of the session during which this message was posted

props.name: sender
props.doc: Role of the entity that sent this message
Time when this message was posted

name: MessageStatementLink
doc: Links statements to messages where they appear

props.name: messageId
props.doc: Id of the message where the linked statement appears

name: Memory
doc: Represents a memory recorded during a conversation

combos.name: StatementLinkedMemory
combos.doc: Includes links to statements made within this memory

props.doc: Id of the message from which this memory was triggered

props.name: archivedAfter
props.doc: Time when this memory was archived

name: MemoryStatementLink
doc: Links statements to memories in which they appear

props.name: memoryId
props.doc: Id of the memory where the linked statement appears
